statements.name: PROC IMPORT
statements.description: Imports an external data file to a SAS data set or table .

statements.name: DATAROW
statements.description: Starts reading data from the specified row number in the delimited text file.

statements.name: DBENCODING
statements.description: Indicates the encoding character set to use for the JMP file.

statements.name: DELIMITER
statements.description: Specifies the delimiter that separates columns of data in the input file.

statements.name: FMTLIB
statements.description: Saves value labels to the specified SAS format catalog.

statements.name: GETNAMES
statements.description: Specifies whether the IMPORT procedure generates SAS variable names from the data values in the first row in the input file.

statements.name: GETSHEETNAMES
statements.description: Returns the worksheet names within an Excel file as a SAS data set.

statements.name: GUESSINGROWS
statements.description: Specifies the number of rows of the file to scan to determine the appropriate data type and length for the variables.

statements.name: META
statements.description: Saves JMP metadata information to the specified SAS data set. (Deprecated)

statements.name: VARNAMEROW
statements.description: Specifies a row from the delimited text file that contains the variable names.
